content.value_statement: An AI skill for Claude, Codex, and Claude Code
actual_capabilities: Generate OKR cascades from company to product to team levels with alignment tracking
Create strategic OKRs for growth, retention, revenue, innovation, and operational excellence
Perform market and competitive analysis for strategic decision-making
Define product vision and strategy frameworks
Design team scaling and organizational structures
Establish metrics and KPI definitions aligned with business objectives
limitations: Requires Python 3 to run the OKR cascade generator script
OKR templates are predefined for five strategic focuses (growth, retention, revenue, innovation, operational)
Does not automatically gather real-time market data
Alignment scores are calculated based on predefined algorithms and may need human validation

use_cases.title: Quarterly OKR Planning
use_cases.description: Generate aligned OKRs across the entire organization from company strategy down to individual team objectives

use_cases.title: Strategic Initiative Alignment
use_cases.description: Ensure product initiatives are properly cascaded and aligned with company-level objectives

use_cases.title: Team Scaling Strategy
use_cases.description: Design organizational structures and team objectives that support strategic growth

prompt_templates.title: Generate Growth-Focused OKRs
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a complete OKR cascade focused on growth strategy
prompt_templates.scenario: Starting a new quarter with aggressive user acquisition goals

prompt_templates.title: Create Retention Strategy OKRs
prompt_templates.prompt: Create OKRs focused on improving customer retention and lifetime value
prompt_templates.scenario: Addressing churn issues and improving product stickiness

prompt_templates.title: Revenue Optimization Planning
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate revenue-focused OKRs with monetization strategies
prompt_templates.scenario: Optimizing pricing strategy and expanding revenue streams

output_examples.output: Company-level objectives for user acquisition and market expansion, cascaded to product team OKRs with specific metrics (MAU targets, growth rates, market expansion), and further broken down to individual team key results with alignment scores and contribution percentages
Multi-level OKR hierarchy focusing on customer loyalty, user experience improvements, and lifetime value metrics with quarterly targets and team assignments

best_practices: Start with clear company-level strategic direction before cascading OKRs
Use the appropriate strategy parameter (growth, retention, revenue, innovation, operational) that matches your current business priorities
Review alignment scores to ensure team OKRs contribute meaningfully to higher-level objectives
Validate generated OKRs with stakeholders and adjust targets based on current baseline metrics
Run the OKR generator at the beginning of each planning cycle to maintain strategic alignment
anti_patterns: Generating OKRs without first defining clear company-level strategic priorities
Using the same strategy focus every quarter without adapting to business needs
Accepting generated OKRs without validating that targets are realistic based on current performance
Cascading OKRs to teams without ensuring they have the autonomy and resources to achieve them
Setting too many objectives at once, diluting focus and reducing execution effectiveness

faq.question: What strategies are available in the OKR cascade generator?
faq.answer: The generator supports five strategic focuses: growth (user acquisition and market expansion), retention (customer loyalty and LTV), revenue (monetization optimization), innovation (new product development), and operational (efficiency and scalability).

faq.question: How does the alignment tracking work?
faq.answer: The OKR cascade generator calculates alignment scores by analyzing how well team-level key results contribute to product and company objectives, providing visibility into strategic coherence across the organization.

faq.question: Can I customize the OKR templates?
faq.answer: Yes, the okr_cascade_generator.py script contains predefined templates that can be modified to match your organization's specific strategic priorities and terminology.
